title: Naseem H. Dillman-Hasso
text: Hi there! I’m Naseem Dillman-Hasso, an Environmental Social Sciences PhD Candidate at (the) Ohio State University. I’m currently advised by Dr. Robyn Wilson and Dr. Nicole Sintov. I’m particularly interested in understanding motivations for pro-environmental behavior, and promoting persistent behavior change through interventions.
